fr.istic.aoc.metronome.observer

Interface MEObserver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EventHandlingController, MockEventHandlingController

    public interface MEObserver
    A class can implement the MEObserver interface when it wants to be informed of changes in the ME type classes. This interface acts as a observer for ME implementations
    Author:
    Jiyoung Park

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void barChanged()
      This method is called whenever the bar field of the MEImpl class is changed Updates the bar value on the UI component
      void beatsChanged()
      This method is called whenever the beats field of the MEImpl class is changed to update the bpm value on the UI component
      void handleBarEvent()
      Flashes LED2 and gives a beep for Bar (Measure)
      void handleBeatEvent()
      Flashes LED1 and gives a beep for Beats (BPM)
      void speedDown()
      Decrease the bpm value of the relative slider and Metronome Engine respectively.
      void speedUp()
      Increase the bpm value of the relative slider and Metronome Engine respectively.
      void start()
      This method is called whenever the bar field of the MEImpl class is changed Updates the bar value on the UI component Starts the metronome.
      void stop()
      Stops the metronome.
